SEARCH
Package scoring

Class ScoreCalculation

java.lang.Object
scoring.ScoreCalculation
public class ScoreCalculation extends Object
Handles scoring pilot success and calculating additional measures that may help draw correlations between pilot performance and their gaze data. The ILS approach can be broken in to the approach (stepdown phase + final approach phase) and landing (roundout phase and landing phase).
TODO: Complete scoring overview How scoring works:
- For each data entry stepdown phase, there is a maximum of 3 points to earn.

    • MAX_PTS_PER_DATA_POINT_ILS

      private static final int MAX_PTS_PER_DATA_POINT_ILS
      Max number of points per data entry during ILS approach. 1 pt each for speed, localizer, and glideslope.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreCalculation

      public ScoreCalculation(String name, int numData, int numSD, int numFA, int numR, int numL, FlightData data)
      Constructs and adds flight data to calculations. Pre-sets max number of points that can be scored.
      Parameters:
      name - participant name or identifier.
      numData - total number of data entries.
      numSD - number of data entries during stepdown phase.
      numFA - number of data entries during final approach phase.
      numR - number of data entries during roundout phase.
      numL - number of data entries during landing phase.
      data - flight data to score.

  • Method Details

    • setMaxPoints

      private void setMaxPoints()
      Calculates the max points for the overall score and sub-scores. Uses the number of entries and max number of points possible for each type of entry to calculate max possible points.

    • localizerScorePenalty

      private double localizerScorePenalty(List<Double> horizontalDef, List<Double> bankAngle)

      Parameters:
      horizontalDef - all of the localizer position of the aircraft in dots.
      Returns:
      the total penalty

    • scoreStepdownCalc

      public double scoreStepdownCalc(List<Double> horiDef, List<Double> speed, List<Double> altitude, List<Double> dme, List<Double> rollBank, List<Double> verticalSpeed)
      Returns the total penalty for the stepdown phase. TODO: add how scoring works
      Parameters:
      horiDef - list of horizontal deflection data
      speed - list of airspeed data in knots
      altitude - list of altitude MSL data in feet
      dme - list of DME distance in nautical miles
      rollBank - list of roll (bank) angles in degrees
      verticalSpeed - list of vertical speed in feet per seconds
      Returns:
      the total penalty

    • scoreFinalApproachCalc

      public double scoreFinalApproachCalc(List<Double> horiDef, List<Double> speed, List<Double> vertDef, List<Double> verticalSpeed, List<Double> rollBankFinalApp)
      returns the total penalty for the final approach phase. Based on the localizer, glideslope, and speed
      Parameters:
      horiDef - all of the localizer position of the aircraft
      speed - The speed of the aircraft during the ILS approach
      vertDef - all of the glideslope position of the aircraft
      Returns:
      double Returns the total penalty

      Parameters:
      horiDef - list of horizontal deflection data in dots
      rollBank - list of bank angles data in degrees

      Returns:
      the total penalty.

    • scoreLanding

      public double scoreLanding(List<Double> horiDef)
      Returns the total penalty for the landing Phase. Based on centerline.
      Parameters:
      horiDef - list of horizontal deflection data during landing phase.
      Returns:
      the total penalty
